overview: This work is derived from one of Jacobs' Nervous Magic Lantern performances, which are created with a hand-manipulated projector and use neither film nor video. Highly stroboscopic and hallucinatory, these kinetic performances result in otherworldly spaces and plays of near-abstraction and suggestive imagery. In Krypton is Doomed, the audio accompaniment to the shifting visuals is an installment of a Superman radio play â€” the first ever broadcast, in 1940. This work highlights Jacobs' relentless experimentation with the very fabric of projected light.
title: Krypton Is Doomed
